title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 175 - Transfers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 175 - Transfers

State Regulations
§ 175.1 to 175.4 - Repealed

Subpart 175-1 - Transfers To State Schools And State Hospitals In The Department Of Mental Hygiene (§ 175-1.1 to 175-1.13)

Subpart 175-2 - Transfers Of Juvenile Delinquents To Secure Facilities (§ 175-2.1 to 175-2.5)

Subpart 175-3 - Repealed (§ 175-3.1 to 175-3.7)

Subpart 175-4 - Transfer Of Juvenile Offenders To The Department Of Correctional Services (§ 175-4.1 to 175-4.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 175

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 19-G, §§
500[2], 501, 508, 515-a.3, 515-b, 517

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
